flavorText: Hunt without Nylea's leave and you may find yourself the next quarry.

foreignData.flavorText: Jage ohne Nyleas Erlaubnis und du wirst dich in der Rolle des Beutetiers wiederfinden.
foreignData.name: Mal des Ausmerzens
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl blockt in diesem Zug, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: Si cazas sin permiso de Nylea, puedes descubrir que la próxima presa eres tú.
foreignData.name: Marca del sacrificio
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo bloquea este turno si puede.

foreignData.flavorText: Chassez sans la permission de Nyléa et vous pourriez être la prochaine proie.
foreignData.name: Marque du sacrifice
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée bloque ce tour-ci si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: Caccia senza il consenso di Nylea e potresti essere la prossima preda.
foreignData.name: Preda da Abbattere
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio blocca in questo turno, se può farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: ナイレア様の許可なく狩りをすれば、お前が次の獲物になるものと知るがいい。
foreignData.name: 選別の印
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それは可能ならブロックする。

foreignData.flavorText: 닐리아의 허락을 받지 않고 사냥을 하면 그녀의 사냥감이 될수도 있다.
foreignData.name: 선별의 표식
foreignData.text: 생물 하나를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 가능하면 이번 턴에 방어한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Cace sem a permissão de Niléia e você poderá ser a próxima presa.
foreignData.name: Marca de Abate
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo bloqueia neste turno se estiver apta.

foreignData.flavorText: Охотящийся без позволения Нилеи может сам превратиться в добычу.
foreignData.name: Отметка Выбраковки
foreignData.text: Целевое существо блокирует в этом ходу, если может.

foreignData.flavorText: 未经倪勒娅许可就行猎，你会发现自己就是下一个猎物。
foreignData.name: 牲祭印记
foreignData.text: 目标生物本回合若能进行阻挡，则必须阻挡。

foreignData.flavorText: 未經倪勒婭許可就行獵，你會發現自己就是下一個獵物。
foreignData.name: 牲祭印記
foreignData.text: 目標生物本回合若能進行阻擋，則必須阻擋。

name: Culling Mark
originalText: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

rulings.text: The creature blocks only if it’s able to do so as the declare blockers step begins. If, at that time, the creature is tapped, it’s affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, or no creatures are attacking its controller or a planeswalker controlled by that player, then it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having the creature block, the player isn’t forced to pay that cost. If that cost isn’t paid, the creature won’t block.
The controller of the creature chooses which attacking creature that creature blocks.

text: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
